description:
The Electromagnetic Newspaper Club of the Sonohara school, focusing on researching UFOs, Mystery Circles and the like.
Originally with only http://anidb.net/ch6964 [Suizenji Kunihiro] as club president (who suspects the http://anidb.net/ch25695 [Sonohara military base] to hide http://anidb.net/ch25705 [UFO technology]) and http://anidb.net/ch6962 [Asaba Naoyuki] as its only member; http://anidb.net/ch6963 [Sudou Akiho] joined because of Asaba.
During episode 2, http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Iriya Kana] is recruited as the club`s fourth member as Suizenji hopes to gain information about the Sonohara military base this way.
name: Sonohara Denpa Shinbun-bu
